===Notes===
* {{PAGENAME}} can only be evolved if a hero knows Candlelight but not {{Wt|Candlelight+}}, for example via [[Inherit Skill|inheritance]]. 
** The reason for the exception may be due to {{Ht|Lyn: Bride of the Plains}} being a time exclusive [[:Category:Special Heroes|special hero]] that came out on May 30th, 2017 and Candlelight+ being added on November 28th, 2017.
